title: The Modern's Tres Jolie Recipe
full_text:
The Modern's Tres Jolie Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Dolin
dry vermouth
1
ounce
Dubonnet Rouge
1/2
ounce
cointreau
2
dashes
orange bitters
Orange twist
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice and add vermouth, Dubonnet, Cointreau, and orange bitters. Stir until chilled and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange twist and serve immediately.
Special equipment
mixing glass and cocktail strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
